info.description: Complete API collection for Designer Onboarding & Portfolio Management System

item.description: Login and get JWT token for protected APIs

exec: // Automatically save token to environment variable

request.description:
Simple login for admin/designer head users. No device_id required.

Response is encrypted by default. Add ?showDecoded=1 to get plain JSON for testing.

Token is automatically saved to {{auth_token}} variable.

request.description: Reject designer application with a detailed reason (minimum 10 characters required)

response.name: Success Response
Validation Error - Reason Too Short

exec: console.log("‚ÑπÔ∏è User is not a designer or creator");

request.description:
Get designer profile information.

Supports 3 user types:
1. **Approved Designer** - Has designer_profile record, returns full profile with wallet
2. **Creator** - Has creator=1 in user_data table, returns basic profile with message
3. **Regular User** - Returns 404 with message to apply

Response is encrypted by default. Add ?showDecoded=1 to get plain JSON for testing.

formdata.value: Beautiful wedding invitation design with floral elements
Beautiful wedding invitation card design with floral elements
Download beautiful wedding invitation card template for free. Customize and create stunning invitations.
SEO optimized and ready to publish
